pr_title: Upon Second Schema deployment, VersionHistoryService reports error

timeline.message:
Upon Second Schema deployment, VersionHistoryService reports error and
the update-schema is stopped. #1065

Signed-off-by: Paul Bastide <pbastide@us.ibm.com>

Cleanup needless semicolon

Signed-off-by: Paul Bastide <pbastide@us.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText:
DB2 SQL Error: SQLCODE=-104, SQLSTATE=42601, SQLERRMC=;;enant_salt || ?, 2));END-OF-STATEMENT
Possibly double end of statement problem? maybe only occurs on Windows versus Mac?
timeline.author: prb112

replies.bodyText: wouldn't our windows e2e test have caught this?  if not, why not?
replies.author: lmsurpre

replies.bodyText:
I thought so too.
I did send a new cli jar to Frances and it worked.
replies.author: prb112
